attributes.additional_details: Adding VAT to private schools has effected many parents heavily to the degree they have had to pull out their children from a better chance of education , and send them to government schools , adding more pressure to the government schools as well as ruining a better opportunity of education for their children overall .
attributes.background: Cancel VAT on private schools , many parents working on the breadline just to give their children a better chance of education .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action:

"Don't apply VAT to independent school fees, or remove business rates relief."
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701268
